backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core types (messages, video/email requests, coin plans, transactions) and importing modules for Stripe, HTTP outcalls, and access control for an AI-powered content creation platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three branding-update features (HTML meta tags, PWA manifest, and UI labels changed to 'Shake.com') to their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/.env: Local environment variable file defining placeholder values for the Stripe publishable key and an empty Groq API key used in development.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting the required VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY and VITE_GROQ_API_KEY variables with format notes and source URLs.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Shake.com' with PWA manifest link, Apple mobile web app meta tags, and an inline service worker registration script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest file with name and short_name set to 'Shake.com', defining standalone display mode, theme colors, and two icon sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API/canister calls, with install, activate, and fetch event handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, renders AppContent, a Toaster, and a PwaInstallBanner.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Authentication gate component that shows a loading spinner during initialization, an error alert on auth failure, the LoginScreen when unauthenticated, or AuthenticatedLayout when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Main authenticated app shell that renders a sidebar navigation, header with coin balance, and routes hash-based navigation to the appropriate page components. Also handles logout, mobile menu, and the coin purchase dialog.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: Wrapper component that checks the user's coin balance and displays an insufficient-coins alert with a buy button when the balance is below the action cost threshold.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: Modal dialog that lists available coin purchase plans fetched from the backend and initiates a Stripe checkout session when the user selects a plan and clicks purchase.
frontend/src/components/LinkShare.tsx: Popover component that lets users share the current page URL via clipboard copy, WhatsApp, Facebook, or Twitter/X.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallBanner: Fixed bottom banner that prompts the user to install the app as a PWA, shown only when a deferred install prompt is available and the app is not already running standalone.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Card component that displays the user's recent coin transaction history (credits and debits) with timestamps and running balance, fetched via the useTransactionHistory hook.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines coin-related numeric constants (action cost, image generation cost, low balance threshold) and user-facing insufficient/low-balance message strings.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports a readonly array of 60+ language options (value/label pairs) for use in script, voice, and subtitle language selector components.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for coin-related queries (balance, plans, transactions) to ensure consistent cache management across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAddCoins.ts: Hook that exposes a mutation to add coins to a target principal by calling the backend actor's `adminAddCoins` method.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: Hook that manages AI image generation by checking coin balance, charging coins via the backend actor, and calling an external image generation API (Stability AI/Replicate/etc.) with a placeholder endpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: Hook that provides script and storyboard generation for AI video creation by calling the backend actor's `generateVideoResponse` method with structured video request parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Hook that manages a multi-turn chat session by calling the Groq API with conversation history, handling image attachments, coin deduction, and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Hook that fetches and returns the current user's coin balance from the backend actor using React Query.
Hook that fetches the list of available coin purchase plans from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Hook that generates cold emails via the backend actor, handling loading state, coin insufficiency errors, and cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateStripeChecko: Hook that creates a Stripe checkout session for a coin purchase plan by calling the backend actor with pricing and redirect URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Hook that manages client-side hash-based routing, mapping URL hash values to valid view names and providing a navigate function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks whether the currently authenticated caller has admin privileges by calling the backend actor's `isCallerAdmin` method.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Mutation hook that calls the backend `purchaseCoins` method with a plan ID and invalidates coin balance and transaction history queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoinsWithS: Mutation hook that completes a Stripe-based coin purchase by passing a session ID and plan ID to the backend, then invalidates coin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Captures the browser's `beforeinstallprompt` event to enable programmatic PWA install prompting, and detects whether the app is already running in standalone mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Stateful hook that calls the backend `generateSeoPack` actor method with a video title and topic, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Stateful hook that generates subtitles via the backend actor and parses the response into normal and SRT formats, with a fallback SRT generator.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: React Query hook that fetches the user's coin transaction history from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Stateful hook that sends a voiceover request (script, gender, language, speed, emotion) to the backend actor and returns the result string.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Stateful hook that builds a structured YouTube script prompt from form data, calls the backend `generateVideoResponse` actor method, and handles insufficient-coins errors with query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for the design system color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelScreen.tsx: Admin panel page restricted to administrators that provides a form to manually add coins to any user account identified by their principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: Utility function that generates a formatted text-based video timeline plan from form data and a photo order array, serving as a placeholder since real MP4 rendering is unsupported.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Defines the MusicTrack interface and generates a mock library of up to 1500 music tracks across 12 categories.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: UI panel for browsing and selecting background music tracks, supporting search and category filtering over a generated library of 1500 tracks.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: Component for uploading and reordering photos to build a video timeline, with controls to move items up/down or remove them.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: AI chat interface page that allows users to send messages with optional image attachments to a Groq-powered chatbot, with support for API key setup, coin balance management, and a coin purchase dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: AI image generation page where users enter a text prompt to generate images using a coin-based system, with balance display, download functionality, and a coin purchase dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: AI video maker page that lets users configure video settings and generate scripts, storyboards, animation plans, and photo-based video timelines using various AI generation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: Cold email generator page where users fill in sender/recipient details and options to produce AI-generated cold emails with optional follow-ups and spam analysis, using a coin-based system.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying the user's coin balance, principal ID, available AI features (chat, YouTube script, video maker, etc.), and a transaction history panel.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page that handles Internet Identity authentication, detects popup blockers, redirects to the dashboard on success, and displays error alerts on failure.
Payment failure/cancellation screen that informs the user no charges were made and provides buttons to retry the purchase or return to the dashboard.
Payment success screen that parses the Stripe session ID and plan ID from the URL hash, calls the coin-crediting mutation, and displays loading, success, or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: User profile page allowing the user to view and update their display name and avatar, copy their principal ID, and log out.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: A form-based wizard page where users define project requirements (goal, target users, key features, constraints) and view a structured summary after submission.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: Tab component for configuring and generating a YouTube video script, with form fields for topic, language, tone, and length, plus display and copy functionality for the generated script.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: Tab component for generating a YouTube SEO pack (titles, description, tags, hashtags, pinned comment, chapters) from a video title and topic, with a copy-all feature.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: React tab component for generating subtitles from script, voiceover, or pasted text, with options for language and style, and support for copying or downloading the result as an SRT file.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: React tab component for generating voiceover scripts with configurable voice gender, language, speed, and emotion, using either the script tab's content or pasted text.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: Main screen for the YouTube Script Generator feature, providing a tabbed interface with Script, Voiceover, Subtitles, and SEO Pack tabs, sharing generated script and voiceover state across tabs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Utility function that builds a human-readable summary string from AI video maker form data, including mode, style, music, and voiceover settings.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient-coins errors and return appropriate user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser download of an image from a given URL using a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Utility function that creates a Blob from text content and triggers a browser download with the specified filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Collection of utility functions for handling image attachments in chat, including file-to-Uint8Array conversion, Blob URL management, and image validation.
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Parses a raw YouTube script string into ordered sections (Hook, Introduction, Main Points, etc.) based on ### headings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors, fonts, border radius, shadows, animations) using OKLCH color variables, with typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Shake.com PWA, tracking existing features, architectural notes, and a pending request to rename the app from 'Wrapper AI' to 'Shake.com' across the UI.
